data.name: She and the Light Bearer: Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Lie down, close your eyes, and listen to the sound of The Forest.
This Official Soundtrack for She and the Light Bearer will bring you back into the magical forest of myths and fairy tales. Accompanied by acoustic guitar, Indonesian ethnic melodies, and melancholic voice.

She and The Light Bearer: Original Soundtrack is brought to you by Pathetic Experience, Masdito Bachtiar, and Christabel Annora.

01 Manah Latu
02 Rikala
03 Gayam
04 Mingkar Mingkuring
05 Gayam (Withered)
06 Memungkur
07 Alang-Alang
08 Gembili
09 Nelangsa
10 Mingkar Mingkuring (Withered)
11 Memungkur (Withered)
12 Witing Wit
13 Memungkur (Corrupted)
14 Mingkar Mingkuring (Corrupted)
15 Gayam (Corrupted)
16 Lelabetan
17 Sarean Pratiwi
18 Cidra
19 Wungu Ayu Bumi
20 Pra-Purna

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: I see that you'll need a very nice window.
  • Processor: Did you mean? a pair of nice scissor?
  • Graphics: Graphics? I can draw it by myself. pfft.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Need something as nice as a guitar to play nice music.
  • Additional Notes: Can you sing? ðŸŽ¹

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: You'll need a very nice and red apple.
  • Processor: a pair of nicer scissor
  • Graphics: I can draw many things for you.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Actually prefers sitar and ukulele than a guitar.
  • Additional Notes: Shall we sing together? ðŸŽµ
